attributes.action: Making the Laindon hills country park national nature  reserve expanding it and planting large area of forest and Lake
attributes.additional_details:
The aim is to try the department for Evironment, food and Rural affairs to give status as national nature reserve for the Laindon hills  country park allowing for expansion of the country park and planting of large community forest and ponds and artificial  wetland lake  for animal life and for the people of the area Basildon and try programme of
rewilding by reintroducting species to park like

Red Squirrels
European Roe deer
European Pool frog
European Tarpan  Wild horses as  grazers
Native breed of cattle
European Beaver
European Stork
European Ospray
European Glow worm site
European Bittern
European Field crickets
European Heron
European bat boxes
Bird Hides
